snippet: As sales continue to slide in the U.S., McDonald’s plans to expand a test that lets customers build their burgers by tapping a touch screen.
abstract: McDonald's, faced with dropping sales in United States, plans to expand a test that lets customers customize their burgers using touch screen.
lead_paragraph: As sales continue to slide in the U.S., McDonald’s plans to expand a test that lets customers build their burgers by tapping a touch screen.

headline.main: McDonald’s Will Expand ‘Build Your Burger’ Test
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Will Expand ‘Build Your Burger’ Test
